Public NotInheritable Class DSACryptoServiceProvider Inherits DSA Implements ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm
public ref class DSACryptoServiceProvider sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::DSA, System::Security::Cryptography::ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm
type DSACryptoServiceProvider = class inherit DSA interface ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: Defines a wrapper object to access the cryptographic service provider (CSP) implementation of the algorithm.

span.span: Defines a wrapper object to access the cryptographic service provider (CSP) implementation of the algorithm.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用类来创建数字签名和保护数据的完整性。You can use the class to create digital signatures and protect the integrity of your data. 若要使用的公钥系统消息进行数字签名，发件人首先将哈希函数应用于该消息以创建消息摘要。To use a public-key system to digitally sign a message, the sender first applies a hash function to the message to create a message digest. 发送方然后使用发件人的私钥来创建发件人的个人签名加密消息摘要。The sender then encrypts the message digest with the sender's private key to create the sender's personal signature. 在收到消息和签名，接收方解密签名，使用发件人的公钥进行恢复的消息摘要，并使用发件人使用的同一个哈希算法对消息进行哈希处理。Upon receiving the message and signature, the receiver decrypts the signature using the sender's public key to recover the message digest and hashes the message using the same hash algorithm that the sender used. 如果接收方计算完全匹配的消息摘要从发送方收到的消息摘要，接收方可以确保消息在传输过程中不被更改。If the message digest that the receiver computes exactly matches the message digest received from the sender, the receiver can be sure that the message was not altered while in transit. 请注意，可以通过任何人，验证签名，这是因为发件人的公钥众所周知。Note that a signature can be verified by anyone, because the sender's public key is common knowledge. > [!NOTE] > 提供较新的非对称算法。Newer asymmetric algorithms are available. 请考虑使用类而不是类。Consider using the class instead of the class. 使用仅为与旧版应用程序和数据兼容。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. 此算法支持密钥长度 1024 位至 512 位增量为 64 位。This algorithm supports key lengths from 512 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 64 bits.

summary.span: Gets a object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.

span.span: Gets a object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.

value.span: 描述有关加密密钥对的附加信息的 对象。

span.span: A object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来检索有关加密密钥对的其他信息。Use the property to retrieve additional information about a cryptographic key pair. 返回对象描述密钥是否可导出，并指定密钥容器名称、 提供程序，有关的信息和其他信息。The returned object describes whether the key is exportable, and specifies the key container name, information about the provider, and other information. 直到调用使用的密钥的方法，不会在其中生成的随机密钥的情况下，创建的密钥容器。In cases where a random key is generated, a key container will not be created until you call a method that uses the key. 某些属性返回的对象属性将引发如果尚未创建的密钥容器。Some properties of the object returned by the property will throw a if a key container has not been created. 若要确保已创建的密钥容器，请调用方法等， ， ， ，依此类推，在调用之前属性。To make sure that a key container has been created, call a method such as , , , , and so on, before you call the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为 true 等效于传递标记，用于对象。Setting this property to true is equivalent to passing the flag to a object. 属性适用于在当前应用程序域中的所有代码虽然对象仅适用于显式引用它的类。The property applies to all code in the current application domain, while the object applies only to classes that explicitly reference it. 这些设置是模拟或未加载其用户配置文件的帐户下运行时很有用。These settings are useful when impersonating or running under an account whose user profile is not loaded.
